item.title: App Marketing predictions using MMM: guide for non-technical dummies
item.description: Disclaimer: I am not a statistician. I always worked with app marketing. I wrote wrote this text for people like me — for who don’t know much about linear regression and stuff. Some of these techniques I tried, most of them not. But I wanna to explore it to answer some questions that important for me. What is MMM? Marketing Mix Modeling is an analysis of historical marketing data to estimate the impact of marketing channels and activities on sales and forecast the future.
